name: CardyHeim
description:
CardyHeim is a 2D platformer adventure game where you will navigate the level from a side view. Throughout the levels in the game, you will face tough opponents. If you knock them down, they will drop cards that you can use against your next enemy. at the rest point, you can discard cards you do not need.

Collect Cards and build a deck that will suit your unique way of playing CardyHeim.

All images, videos, and sound provided are in-game capture
CardyHeim is developed by a single-person developer and all the Assets used in this game are listed in the credit menu.
